text: Lambert Belmas (born 11 August 1997) is a French rugby league footballer who plays as a for the Catalans Dragons in the Super League and France at international level. Belmas has spent time on loan at Saint-Esteve in the Elite One Championship. ==Background== Belmas was born in Carcassonne, France. ==Career== In 2017 he made his Super League début for Catalans against the Huddersfield Giants.Catalans ease past Huddersfield for back-to-back wins ==International career== He was selected in France 9s squad for the 2019 Rugby League World Cup 9s. ==References== ==External links== *Catalans Dragons profile *Catalans profile *Super League: Huddersfield Giants 22-29 Catalans Dragons *SL profile *2017 RLWC profile Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:Rugby league props Category:French rugby league players Category:Catalans Dragons players Category:People from Carcassonne Category:Sportspeople from Aude
title: Lambert Belmas
